entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] While debugging, app with ACTION_SEND Intent-Filter crashes when a file is shared to it #10384
  • Resizetizer canot find existing images #10380
  • Windows cannot install package Microsoft.WindowsAppRuntime.1.1_1003.565.600.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe #10379
  • Review CollectionView swipe navigation for WinUI #10374
    Backlog
  • Mac Connection: System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.DotNet.Configurer, #10373
  • Make the .ctor of the NavigableElement public #10370
    Backlog
  • Maui Blazor No Hot Reload. #10367
  • [Android] Modal Pages do not fill screen when in Fullscreen #10364
  • Deployed MAUI app as MSIX on server 2019 not unpackage #10363
  • iOS NPE on navigating away from TabbedPage #10362
    Backlog

Closed

  • HorizontalOptions DO NOT Work on HorizontalStackLayout #10300
  • AL1012: 'arm64' is not a valid setting for option 'platform' thrown when localized resources are available and debugging on remote iOS device #10342
  • Maui failed to reference ios binding library #10344
  • Unable to build iOS Binding Library wrapping iOS Framework Native Reference #10377
  • VS 17.3.4 Breaks Android build with - Manifest file at 'obj\Debug\net6.0-android\android-arm\staticwebassets.build.json' not found #10102
    7.0
  • Two presses of the Tab key are required to move keyboard focus from the Open Navigation button to the first focusable control that follows it #8963
    Backlog
  • Two presses of the Tab key are required to move keyboard focus away from a CollectionView item that has a semantic description #8964
    .NET 8 Planning
  • UI Automation Name of a Windows Maui CollectionView item isn't updated after a change to its DataTemplate's Grid's bound SemanticProperties.Description #8722
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Entry] Cursor makes undesired jumps #6916
    7.0-rc2
  • MSBuild says Android API 31 missing when trying to build MAUI app, but it isn't missing. #10337
  • In iOS, calling .Clear() on an ObservableCollection bound to a listview causes a nullref #9302
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Sending e-mail works in Android but not in Windows #7826
    7.0-rc2
  • FilePicker issues when using WindowsPackageType=None #10313
  • Global MAUI Reference #10345
  • [iOS] Status Bar Background rectangle visible in Landscape mode #10349
  • NullReferenceException from Shell GetBackButtonBehavior #10348

PullRequests

Created

  • PhoneCallManager no longer works on Windows 11 #10381
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #10375
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Allow to reset an Image setting the Source to null #10371
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Display alerts by Window #10368
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [iOS] Fix crash disposing TabbedPage #10366
    t/bug, area/TabbedPage
  • [Tizen] Use Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia.Views.SkiaGraphicsView #10359
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10358
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen

Merged

  • Make sure StackLayout Spacing property propagates to generated Grid #10376
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix AdaptiveTriggers #9984
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, 7.0
  • Fix remaining (API) docs warnings #10090
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, t/docs 📝
  • [Tizen] Fixes Border measure issue to reflect Width/HeightRequest #10361
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • Fix Semantic Property Propagation and CV TabStop #10156
    area/a11y, 7.0
  • [iOS] Fix NRE when removing prototype cell #10369
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/ListView
  • [Windows] Fix Essentials Email #10063
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix FilePicker on Windows Unpackaged #10356
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, 7.0-rc2
  • Use a better fix for the ios16 things #10355

Updated

  • Sizing and inset math corrections for Button contentlayout #10309
    area/controls 🎮, 7.0-rc2
  • [android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default #10153
    platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 7.0
  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    partner/winui, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • [Android] Show keyboard when Entry, Editor and SearchBar get focus #5995
    t/bug, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • [Windows] Fix crash scrolling Shell Flyout list (CollapseOnScroll) #9962
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Disconnect lifecycle callback when nav removed #10353
    platform/android 🤖, area/lifecycle 🔁, 7.0-rc2
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating on Shell using a custom TitleView #10160
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 Planning
  • Bumps for 7.0.0-rc2 #10290
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix shadows on shapes #8808
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0
  • Don't force the TextDirection on Android unless the content direction can't be determined #10132
    platform/android 🤖, area/localization, 7.0
  • Validate image format before resize in Resizetizer #9986
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️, .NET 7 + Servicing
